actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The decapus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tentacles.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition grappled} by the decapus. 7 (2d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (9d4 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage or 14 (5d4 + 2 damage) bludgeoning damage if the decapus is grappling a creature other than the target or if the decapus is on the ground or floor. The target is also {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) unless the decapus is already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.
